TopicTitle: French Air Force Weapons Packs - Developpement Topic

Articles.Content:
Bonjour, je me lance dans la création de mod avec pour but un pack d'armes française pour BD Armory.

Pour le moment toute aide est la bienvenue. Je commence par le MDBA Meteor

Hi, i'm going to mod creation with the goal to make a french weapons pack for BD Armory.

For the moment all help are welcome. I start with MBDA Meteor.

Interesting, REALLY looking forward to seeing some of your work!

I love BDA and all the weapon addons!

I will suggest, however, check some of the other BDA addon mods, to see if they already have certain items already.

SpannerMonkey's SMI_MissileLaunchers already has an excellent performing MBDA Meteor. (it could use a nicer texture thought  )

Nothing wrong with having another one, but you may choose to start with something different, if what you planned already exists.

Cheers.

Edited February 2, 2018 by TheKurgan
